extendedInfo.description: The StudyUp App allows you to take notes during your school classes with your mobile device; either by typing or free hand writing,  You can also record lectures while taking notes, so you can be sure not to miss any important information.  Best of all, we make it easy to review your notes or class recordings from anywhere at anytime!  StudyUp keeps your notes organized by subject, and lets you share them with your Study Buddies. Miss a class? No problem. Your Buddies have you covered. They can share with you and save the day! Brought to you by the leading study notes website on the internet, StudyUp.com, the App also enables you to effectively keep track of your quizzes, assignments, tests and exams. You simply enter the information from your course outlines, and we automatically create deadlines for you to follow.  You can also create ToDo lists associated with your assignments and exams. Never be surprised or unprepared for another test or quiz again!Once downloaded, if you are not already a member of StudyUp.com, the App will request that you sign up, by selecting a user ID, and entering some other simple information.  This username will work to log in for both the mobile App, as well as the website. Notes you take with the App are saved via our cloud to the website, where you can store your entire scholastic career, securely, online.Use the StudyUp App to get instant updates when your Study Buddies add notes. Search for your friends that have already signed up to StudyUp, or Invite your Buddies to join you at StudyUp in improving you study habits. And there is more.Key Features:- Take notes by typing, free hand writing, or drawing.- Tap the microphone on the "Add Notes" page to begin recording a lecture.- Organize all  your notes by subject and class for easy review.- Get alerts for assignments, quizzes, tests and exams deadlines.- Record all of your grades for easy reference throughout the term.- Keep track of your Study Buddies's activities with the Study Feed function.- Archive your notes instantly to your Free StudyUp.com account.- Share your notes on Facebook.Classes and Tags we support:Spanish, French, German, Italian, math, chemistry, biology, psychology, language arts, science, nursing, English literature, history, economics, home economics, journalism, business, political science, business law, engineering, criminology, creative writing, sociology, social work, anthropology, management, commerce, international business, accounting, marketing, finance, computer science, advertising, law, agriculture, horticulture, religious studies, education, school, college, high school, university, teacher tools, student tools, study notes,  quiz, quizzing, quizzes, tests, assignments, exams, study tips, study skills, studying, notebook, study strategies, mobile studying, free study tool, notes, calendar, task, online, note storage, memory tools, memorization, timetable, schedule, homework, exam, test, assessment, grade, holiday, class schedule, pupil, student, school timetable.

reviews.title: Uni
reviews.comment: Nice app to use for my notes thnx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great one
reviews.comment: Downloaded this App after struggling with my Biology class. I am not a very organised student too say the least. This App makes it it super easy to manage my course assignments, and I can invite the students from my Bio group project so we can share our work. Nicely done.
reviews.author: Mike tine

reviews.title: This App does it.
reviews.comment: I have been looking for a way to better organize all of my class notes for a long time. This App does it. Signed up with the App, and was able to import all of my Word documents with my notes into the website with the free membership I received. Now I can network with my classmates and share notes which is super cool as well.
reviews.author: BILAL ABBASI

reviews.title: Very Helping App
reviews.comment: Just tried this App out in my English Literature class today. worked great. Recorded the Lecture and took a few notes at the Same Time. Went back later and Complete the notes by Reviewed the Recording. Looking forward to a GPA boost soon.
reviews.author: usman butt

reviews.title: Unable to submit or load anything.
reviews.comment: No matter what I press, just constant never ending loading.
reviews.author: Faith Gary

reviews.title: Very cool App.
reviews.comment: Just tested this out in my Economics class this morning. Worked great.  No hiccups and the UI is very smooth. Now going to invite my friends so we can share notes. Thanks!
reviews.author: Jonathan Richards
